title: Swarm: Panic when swarm is started with invalid ethapi
body:
#### System information

Geth version: 
Version: 1.5.8-unstable
Protocol Versions: [63 62]
Network Id: 1
Go Version: go1.7.3

OS & Version: Linux

Commit hash : (if `develop`)

#### Expected behaviour
should not panic when swarm is started and peers are not reachable

#### Actual behaviour
Looks like ens calls a contract even if there is not ethapi 
http://pastebin.com/XmN92Rxg

#### Steps to reproduce the behaviour
start swam with  -- ethapi "" (double quotes with no space in between)


#### Backtrace
I0126 12:35:17.118746 swarm/api/http/server.go:88] Swarm HTTP proxy started on localhost::8500
I0126 12:35:17.118921 node/node.go:341] IPC endpoint opened: /home/zahoor/BZZ/testnet/bzzd.ipc
I0126 12:35:20.118824 swarm/network/hive.go:165] no peer
I0126 12:35:23.118793 swarm/network/hive.go:165] no peer
I0126 12:35:26.118780 swarm/network/hive.go:165] no peer
I0126 12:35:26.824851 server.go:2317] http: panic serving 127.0.0.1:55932: runtime error: invalid memory address or nil pointer dereference
goroutine 611 [running]:
net/http.(*conn).serve.func1(0xc421345080)
    /usr/local/go/src/net/http/server.go:1491 +0x12a
panic(0xb0d140, 0xc420010130)

    /home/zahoor/go/src/github.com/ethereum/go-ethereum/accounts/abi/bind/base.go:131 +0x4cb

    /usr/local/go/src/net/http/server.go:1726 +0x44
net/http.serverHandler.ServeHTTP(0xc420294580, 0x1224e20, 0xc42158e0d0, 0xc4212d8780)
    /usr/local/go/src/net/http/server.go:2202 +0x7d
net/http.(*conn).serve(0xc421345080, 0x1225ce0, 0xc42133bc80)
    /usr/local/go/src/net/http/server.go:1579 +0x4b7
created by net/http.(*Server).Serve
    /usr/local/go/src/net/http/server.go:2293 +0x44d
I0126 12:35:29.118745 swarm/network/hive.go:165] no peer

I0126 12:35:38.118769 swarm/network/hive.go:165] no peer
thanks @jmozah . not sure if availability of peers have anything to do with this but indeed the bug is obviously there
